tag_list: speaking, presentations, organist, pianist, entertainer, fundraiser, writer
overview:
I am a musician moving into more and more voluntary work as time goes on.

My website http://erikscauses.weebly.com gives more up to date information as to how this is process is developing I was never one to seek a dull life, although it may appear that way to some! My daughter constantly tells me I “need to get out more!” It’s amazing what can be achieved at a desk with a reasonable computer, Blackberry and other gadgets!

I am prepared to give presentations and talks for those who want to know any more about the causes I promote, take and give talks in churches and any kinds of groups. Either email me on erikretallick”yahoo.co.uk or call me on 01323 509274 or 07861 436698 and we can make any arrangements. I can also play organ for weddings, services and other occasions as well as provide piano/keyboard entertainment. I’m not quite as versatile as an egg though.
